alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 14 at 12:56AM CST until December 14 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 200 AM CST. * At 1256 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Larto, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Larto around 105 AM CST. Mayna around 115 AM CST. Wildsville around 145 AM CST. Frogmore around 150 AM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
